task.title: Add Scene & Source
task.shortdesc: To start recording, a Scene is to be added. There can be multiple scenes which an agent can change and display while screen recording.

context.p: OBS Studio starts with a blank scene by default. Agents can add all kinds of Sources to the scenes â€” to show browser, window capture, display capture, webcam, etc.

step.cmd: At the bottom of the main window, click the '+' icon in the Scenes control tab.
Click the '+' icon in the Sources control tab.
step.stepresult: A list of different sources is displayed.
